room_title: Escape room "Subway Escape" by Escape Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
room_description:
In 1980, a crime-infested city in the U.S. was converted into a maximum security prison. The walls around the city were sealed, and any remaining inhabitants, whether innocent or guilty, were sentenced to life in the prison.
In a battle of life and death, the inmates formed gangs in order to survive. After years of chaos, a criminal mastermind known as Niko took control of the city.
Your gang, The Rockers, have been accused in the disappearance of Niko. You must safely navigate your way to the gangâ€™s secret hideout, find evidence which proves your innocence and broadcast it to the other gangs of the city.
